<nowiki>[[http://www.pycage.de/software_expocity.html|Expocity]]</nowiki> is an effort to integrate an efficient means of switching between applications into the window manager <nowiki>[[metacity]]</nowiki>, similar to <nowiki>[[http://www.apple.com/macosx/features/expose/|Expos√©(tm)]]</nowiki> on Apple's OS-X.
== Requirements ==
Be sure to have all dependencies installed. Some of them are:
<pre>
apt-get install build-essential libgtk2.0-dev libgconf2-dev
</pre>

== Installation ==
=== Download ===
Download the latest version from the <nowiki>[[http://www.pycage.de/software_expocity.html|Expocity Homepage]]</nowiki>.

=== Compiling ===
Extract the source.
<pre>
tar xvfj expocity-2.6.2-1.tar.bz2
</pre>

Configure and compile it:
<pre>
./configure
make
</pre>

install it
<pre>
sudo make install
</pre>

or to install it via a deb file (CheckInstall)
<pre>
sudo checkinstall
</pre>

Start it:
<pre>
metacity --replace
</pre>

=== Troubleshooting ===
Installing Gnome 2.0 libraries and related shared libraries might help if the ./configure script complain about gconf2.0 :

<pre>
sudo apt-get install libgnomeui*
</pre>
